name: Adventure Trip: New York Collector's Edition
name_original: Adventure Trip: New York Collector's Edition
description:
Want to experience the adventure of the Big Apple? From the lush green Central Park to the city view from the Brooklyn Bridge and beautiful historical landmark such as the classic Rockefeller Center. The game will take you through 20 ethereal locations.

As the game unfolds, you are presented with 8 mini puzzles with lots of levels which will add to the fun and give you a little break from fact-finding.

• 100 amazing facts to find
• Explore 20 locations of New York
• Collect 15 unique items for your treasure
• 5 Modes – Word, Silhouette, Scrambled Word, Missing Vowels, Finding Pairs
• Collector Edition include, 14 extra locations, 3 mini games with total of 60 levels.
